about_the_game:
Dot is a peaceful game about traversal of worlds.

The purpose of Dot is to ascend to the next world in the least number of actions possible. You can play as a dot, heart, cat or penguin. Enjoy this game as a free experience. Relax and calmly navigate this unique space.

Use the mouse to direct the dot in a direction of travel and click to move the dot. The dot continues to travel until it reaches a rest point, or falls off the platform. Navigate platforms and rest points to reach the ascension location and progress to the next world. Activate buttons and avoid darkness to reach the game's unknown conclusion.

This is an open ended experience where the player chooses when to complete or end the game, there are no right or inright, correct or incorrect, affirmative or confirmative solutions. Please enjoy. With Love,

Little Sky Studios.
